hero.hero_description: With passion at the core, our adaptable drone services based in Luxembourg deliver clean, compelling visual content, ready to meet the unique requirements of clients both locally and beyond.

services1.title: Event Photography
services1.description: Elevate the experience of your attendees and the memory of your event with our elite drone coverage. Specializing in aerial photography for any occasion—from weddings to corporate events to sports—our drones are piloted by certified professionals who are adept at capturing unique, breathtaking perspectives that traditional photography simply cannot achieve.

feature1.title: Basic Coverage
feature1.description: Get raw video footage of your entire event. Ideal for those who prefer a simple, unedited record.

feature2.title: Standard Package
feature2.description: Enjoy a professionally edited 5-10 minute highlight reel along with all raw footage, perfect for sharing your event's best moments.

feature3.title: Premium Package
feature3.description: Receive a comprehensive 10-20 minute video edit, 30-50 high-resolution images, custom music, and a revision session, capturing every aspect of your event in stunning detail.

services2.title: Real Estate Photography
services2.description: Set your real estate properties apart with stunning aerial imagery. Our certified drone pilots specialize in capturing the beauty and uniqueness of each property, providing potential buyers with a dynamic and attractive presentation that increases interest and engagement.

feature1.title: Basic Flyover
feature1.description: 5-10 aerial photos and raw video footage of the property, perfect for quick and efficient property showcases.

feature2.title: Standard Package
feature2.description: Receive 20-30 stunning aerial photos, a 3-5 minute cinematic video tour, advanced editing features, twilight shots, and 3D mapping, providing a comprehensive view of your property.

feature3.title: Premium Package
feature3.description: Receive 20-30 stunning aerial photos, a 3-5 minute cinematic video tour, advanced editing features, twilight shots, and 3D mapping, providing a comprehensive view of your property.

customService.title: Custom Solutions for Your Unique Needs
customService.description: We know every project is unique. That's why we're more than willing to adapt our drone services to fit your specific needs. Get in touch to discuss your project, and let's work together to create a custom solution that suits your requirements and budget.
customService.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

regulations.title: Drone Regulations in Luxembourg
regulations.description: Operating drones in Luxembourg requires adherence to specific regulations to ensure safety and compliance. Stay informed and ensure your drone activities are within legal guidelines. Learn more about drone regulations in Luxembourg on the
regulations.linkText: official website of the Directorate of Civil Aviation

about.title: About Us
about.description: We're a young and energetic team from Luxembourg. We love what we do and are happy to travel to provide our drone services. Wherever you are, we're here to help capture great visuals for you. Learn more on our

team.content: Meet Darren, the multi-talented maestro behind the lens. As our video editor, photographer, and drone pilot, Darren is always on the pursuit of the perfect shot, blending art and technology seamlessly.
team.name: Delgado Darren
team.title: Drone Pilot, Photographer

team.content: Say hello to Ben, our cheerful drone pilot for events. With a smile that never fades, Ben is dedicated to not only capturing the shots our clients envision but also exceeding their expectations with every flight.
team.name: Thillen Ben
team.title: Drone Pilot, Event Specialist

team.content: Meet Tun, the mastermind of precision in our team. As both a drone pilot and our operations manager, he oversees every technical detail, ensuring that our projects are executed flawlessly and efficiently.
team.name: Keltesch Tun
team.title: Drone Pilot, Operations Manager

cta.title: Contact Us!
cta.description: Learn how our drone services can enhance your project with stunning aerial visuals.

footer.tagline: Elevate Your Perspective with Drone Imagery

formModal.submitAlert: Form submitted! We will get back to you soon.

formModal.responseTimeInfo: We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

questions.question: What services does Swift Drones offer?
questions.answer: Swift Drones provides a wide range of drone services including aerial photography, videography, surveying, mapping, inspection, and agricultural monitoring.

questions.question: How can I book a drone service?
questions.answer: You can book a service through our website by navigating to the 'Services' page and selecting the service you need.
